resources.string: I-Minisass iyithuluzi elilula elingasetshenziswa yinoma ngubani ukuqapha impilo yomfula. Uqoqa isampula yama-macroingvertertbrates (izilwane ezincane) ezivela emanzini, futhi kuya ngokuthi amaqembu atholakala ngawo, unesilinganiso esithile sempilo yezempilo evamile yezempilo neyemanzi kulowo mfula.
Ividiyo ye-minisass i-Walkthrough Video izokuthatha ngendlela yokusebenzisa uhlelo lokusebenza.

resources.string: Isayithi lizosindiswa kuwebhusayithi yeMinisass ngokuzayo lapho usebenzisa uhlelo lokusebenza, uma uxhumeke kwi-Intanethi.
Isayithi lizovuselelwa kuwebhusayithi yeMinisass ngokuzayo lapho usebenzisa uhlelo lokusebenza, uma uxhumeke kwi-Intanethi.
Ukuhlola kuzogcinwa ku-inthanethi ngokuzayo lapho usebenzisa uhlelo lokusebenza, uma uxhumeke kwi-Intanethi.

Ukuze uqede ukubhaliswa, sicela uchofoze kusixhumanisi sokwenza kusebenze okuthunyelwe ku-imeyili oyibhalisile.Uma ubhalise ngempumelelo ngempumelelo ungabuyela kuhlelo lokusebenza ukuze ungene ngemvume.

Ungeze ngempumelelo isiza sakho futhi usukulungele ukuqala isampula!Isampula izindawo zokuhlala eziningi ngangokunokwenzeka (idwala, uSandy, kanye ne-gravel, isihlabathi, nodaka (GSM (GSM) kulandela imihlahlandlela) bese uhlela isithombe se-aquatic macroinvertertebrebrebrebrates otholwe kumathileyi ngamunye.Uma usukulungele, chofoza inkinobho ethi \'Faka Ukuhlola\' ukuze uqale ukuthatha izithombe zodwa okuhlukile futhi uzikhomba.
Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa leli sayithi?
Sicela uxhume idivaysi yakho kwi-Intanethi bese uzama futhi
Kukhona into engahambanga kahle.Sicela uzame futhi.
Isakhiwo sangaphandle / izindlu ezenziwe ngamahlumela noma izinhlayiya zesihlabathi
Umlenze ochazwe kahle lapho kuvela khona i-invertebrate
Isidumbu esiphakeme lapho kufakwe khona imilenze
I-appendage evulekile eqinile enamathiselwe ekugcineni komzimba / isisu
Umsila onamava amaningi amancane anamathiselwe ephuzwini lendawo elifana ne-tuft encane
I-appendage emfushane yesiginali enamathiselwe ekugcineni komzimba / isisu
Amehlo amakhulu aphumayo akha ingxenye yohlaka lwekhanda
Umzimba omfishane lapho imilenze inamathiselwe khona
Umbhangqwana wama-appendages amafushane we-sensory / amade anamathiselwe ekhanda
Ukuba nokuncenga izingxenye emikhawulweni yomibili yezinto eziphilayo ezinamathisela ebusweni
Izakhiwo ezincane ezithambile emzimbeni ophezulu ozokhula zibe ngamaphiko
Izakhiwo ezifishane ze-Stubby Leg-efana nekhanda ezinhlangothini zombili zomzimba

Sicela uthathe isithombe sohlobo olulodwa lohlobo oluhlukile olutholile.Qhubeka uthathe izithombe uze ube neyodwa evela kwelinye lamaqembu owatholile.Chofoza u-Capture ukuze uqale ukungeza izithombe zezinhlobo.
Yini ama-aquatic macroinvertertbrents futhi kanjani ama-minisass awasebenzisa kanjani ukuthola imali?
Kungani ikhwalithi yamanzi nokusakazwa kwezempilo kubalulekile?

I-Aquatic MacroInvertebrates yizilwane ezincane ezihlala ezinhlelweni zamanzi futhi azinawo amathambo angaphakathi.Ziyabonakala esweni elinqunu, yingakho igama elithi \'Macro\' lisho \'enkulu\'. \ N \ n Izinhlobo ezahlukene zama-macroinverterrates anezinhlamvu ezihlukile zokubekezelela noma ukuzwela kokuphazamiseka endaweni yazo.Lokhu kusho ukuthi umuntu angabheka umphakathi we Ama-MacroInvertertbrates akhona emfuleni noma emfuleni futhi athambe okuthile ngekhwalithi yamanzi nempilo yohlelo. \ n \ n Ngokuyisisekelo ezinhlelweni eziphazamisekile, ngokwesibonelo lapho kunokungcola noma izinhlobo eziningi ezihlaselayo ezihlaselayo, izinhlobo ezibucayi kakhulu futhi ezibekezelayo kungalindeleka ukuba zinyamalale, Ngenkathi izinhlobo ezibekezelayo nezinkulu nangaphezulu zizohlala zikhona noma zikhule ngamanani. \ N \ n IMinisass ibeka zonke izinhlobo zasemanzini Macroinvertertebrate zibe yizinhlobo eziyi-13 kulula ukubona amaqembu, futhi inika lezo zikolo zamaqembu ngokusekelwe kokujwayelekile, ukubekezelela okuphakathi nendawo futhi amazinga wokuzwela wezinhlobo kulawo maqembu.Izikolo eziphansi zabelwa emaqenjini ajwayele ukwakhiwa kwezinhlobo ezibekezelela kakhulu (ezingasinda ekungcoleni nasekuphazamiseka), ngenkathi Izikolo eziphakeme zinikezwa amaqembu ajwayele ukwakhiwa kwezinhlobo ezibucayi kakhulu (ezingakwazi ukuhlala futhi ziphile uma kunokungcola noma ukuphazamiseka). \ n \ n Kuhlelo lokusebenza lwe-Minisass, uthwebula izithombe ze-Aquatic MacroInverterTebrates uhleliwe.Unikeza ukukhonjwa kulezi zithombe.Ngasikhathi sinye, ukufunda umshini .Uhlelo lokusebenza bese lukhiqiza amaphuzu omsebenzisi, kanye ne-ML Score.Lokhu kungaqhathaniswa njengesiqondisi kumsebenzisi uma ekhomba kahle noma mhlawumbe kudingeka ukuthi avakashele amahlosi awo. \ N \ n Ucwaningo lweMinisass lusampula umfudlana noma umfula ngalezi zakhi zasemanzini zasemanzini, futhi ukhiqize amaphuzu ngokususelwa ekuzwela okuphakathi nokubekezelela umphakathi okhona. Isikolo bese sihlobene nesigaba semvelo, esibonisa ukusakazwa noma umfula impilo nekhwalithi yamanzi. \ N \ n

Amanzi amasha aqakathekileko ezilwaneni eziphilayo nakubantu.Ixhasa I-EcoSystems kanye nazo zonke izimpahla nezinsizakalo abazinikezayo, futhi isekela umuntu Ezolimo, imboni, ukuthuthwa kwendle kanye ne-hydration.Ukuphatha I-Precious yethu futhi Imvamisa Izinhlelo zamanzi ezihlanzekile ezilambile zidinga ukuqapha impilo nekhwalithi yethu imifudlana nemifula.Ngokuyisisekelo, ukuphathwa okufanele nokungenelela kwe Imvelo ye-FreshWater yemvelo ingakhiwa kuphela futhi yenziwe ngentengo uma kukhona okuhle Ukuqapha idatha ukukhombisa lapho kunezinkinga, noma lapho kusebenza khona isixazululo!

I-Minisass isuselwa kwinqubo ejulile ye-biolomonitoring, eningizimu Uhlelo lwe-African Scoring (SASS).Uhlelo lwe-sass lukhuni imifudlana futhi Imifula, ikhomba wonke ama-macroinvertertebrates asemanzini akhona ezingeni lomndeni (ngaphezulu kwamaqembu ahlukene angama-90).UDkt P. Mark Graham noDkt Chris W.S.Amashibhodi kucwengeze amaqembu phansi ku-minisass 13, okulula kakhulu ukukhonjwa kepha kusanikeza isithombe esihle sekhwalithi yamanzi nokusakaza noma Impilo yomfula, ofana nemininingwane ye-SASS Survey.I-minisass yasekuqaleni wayesekelwe ku-SASS version 4, kepha uvuselelwe ukuvumelanisa nokuningi yakamuva yakwa-SAS5.

Khumbula njalo, ukuphepha kuqala!Lapho ucabanga ngokwenza inhlolovo ye-minisass, sicela uhlole okwakho Eduze futhi uqiniseke ukuthi umfudlana noma umfula nendawo ephephile.Ungangeni emifudlaneni noma imifula ejulile noma enemikhuba enamandla, egeleza ngokushesha, noma ikhona okuyingozi izilwane kuzo noma eduzane.\ n \ n Zivikele nge-sunscreen kanye nezingubo ezifanele (ama-gumboots nezigqoko), futhi ukhumbule ukugeza izandla zakho nge-sanitizer noma insipho njalo.Qikelela ikakhulukazi ukungcoliswa Imifula nemifudlana, ethatha izinyathelo zokuphepha ezengeziwe ukuze uzigcine uphephile futhi uphilile. IMinisass imnandi ngokwengeziwe futhi iphephe nabanye!\ n \ n
- I-Aquatic MacroInverterBrertbrates: Encane, kepha iyabonakala esweni elinqunu, izilwane ezingenayo Amathambo angaphakathi futhi ahlala ezinhlelweni zamanzi.

- I-BionikeniCitoring: Lokhu kubhekise kakhulu ekusebenziseni izidalwa (e.g., Algae, Macroinververterterbrebrates, Izinhlanzi, izinyoni, noma izilwane ezincelisayo) ezihlala endaweni yokuhlola amanani noma okufanele imininingwane mayelana naleya ndawo.
- Izinto eziphilayo: zonke izinhlobo ezahlukene zokuphila endaweni.Ngokuyisisekelo, igama elibhekise kulo Zonke izitshalo, izilwane, isikhunta, noma noma iyiphi impilo emvelweni.
- Isayensi yesakhamuzi: Umphakathi jikelele obandakanyeka ocwaningweni lwesayensi, nganoma iyiphi indlela Ukusuka ekwakhiweni kocwaningo, ngokuqoqwa kwedatha nokuhlaziywa, ukubika okutholakele.
- Ukulondolozwa: Ukuvikela nokubuyisa izinhlelo zemvelo, ukuvimbela ukugcwala, nokugcina ukwehluka kwemvelo kanye nempilo kanye nomsebenzi wezemvelo.

- I-Ecosystem: Umphakathi wokuxhumana kwezinto eziphilayo kanye nemvelo ebonakalayo bahlala kuzo.Ukuchazwa kohlelo lonke, kufaka phakathi konke okuhlukahlukene kwezinto eziphilayo nezici zendawo yokukhubazeka.

- Umshini-Learning (ML): Izinhlelo zekhompyutha ezikwazi ukufunda nokuvumelanisa ngaphandle kokulandela imiyalo ecacile.Ikhompyutha ifunda ngokusebenzisa ama-algorithms kanye namamodeli wezibalo ukuze ahlaziye futhi adwebe izingcaphuno ezivela kumaphethini kudatha. Kwi-minisass i-Deep-Neural-Network izitimela ezithombeni ezihlonziwe kahle ze I-Aquatic MacroInverterBrertbrates futhi ufunde ukubaveza ngokuya ngamaqembu ayi-13 ama-minisass.

Sonke singadlala indima ekubhekeni izinsiza ezifuywayo ezihlanzekile, sisiza ukuqoqa idatha edingekayo ukubaphatha.Ngokubamba iqhaza kwisayensi yeCitizen, noma ngubani angaba ebalulekile Umhlinzeki wokucwaninga nokulondolozwa!\ n \ n "ukuqhuba inhlolovo ye-minisass kusisiza Funda ngezinhlelo zamanzi ahlanzekile kanye nokubaluleka kokuhlukahlukana kwezinto eziphilayo kanye namanzi amnandi aphilile I-EcoSystems, bese usifaka nemvelo nemiphakathi yethu.Kuyithuluzi elivumela I-US thatha isenzo ukusiza ukuqapha nokugcina izinhlelo zethu zamanzi amnandi.\ n \ n " Imiphumela yocwaningo lwe-minisass inikeza inkomba enhle yekhwalithi yamanzi nempilo womfula noma umfula, osebenza ukugcwala ukungcoliswa okungenzeka, noma uphumelele futhi usebenze izinhlelo.Ukuqashwa okuqhubekayo komfula noma umfula ofanayo kunganikeza ukuqonda okumangalisayo ushintsho ngokuhamba kwesikhathi. \ n \ n "Uma usuthole amaphuzu akho amaminithi, ungalandela futhi Iziphathimandla zasekhaya ezifanele zokuzithola zilandele ezinkingeni ezisolwayo zisebenzisa eyakho idatha njengesikhombi! \ n \ n
